title: Flag of Finland
cardDescription: The flag of Finland features a blue Nordic cross on a white background.
description: The flag of Finland features a blue Nordic cross on a white background. The blue coloring is said to represent the country's thousands of lakes and the sky, with white for the snow that covers the land in winter.

content: Proportion:
Finished size:
Hook size:
15cm x 9cm
3,5 mm
Yarn:
White (as A)
Blue (as B)
/crochet-pattern-images/european-flags/flag-of-finland.png

content.content: This pattern is worked horizontally starting from the middle and doing top and bottom parts separately. Also note that the starting chain is counted as row 1.

content: With B, ch 30
Sc 2nd ch from hook and each sc across, turn
Ch 1, sc 28, sba, turn
Ch 1, sc 15, sab, sc 4, sba, sc 8, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 12, turn
Ch 1, sc 15, sab, sc 4, sba, sc 8, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 12, turn
Ch 1, sc 15, sab, sc 4, sba, sc 8, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 12, fasten off
attach B to first ch row 1, ch 1, sc 29, turn
Ch 1, sc 28, sba, turn
Ch 1, sc 15, sab, sc 4, sba, sc 8, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 12, turn
Ch 1, sc 15, sab, sc 4, sba, sc 8, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 12, turn
Ch 1, sc 15, sab, sc 4, sba, sc 8, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 12, turn

content.content: For help with the pattern, please see the General Instructions from the main page:
